features: Quality Throughout:Built adventure-tier touch with superior durability and scratch resistance, PowerCore Slim 10000 is premium both inside and out.

Slim Size, Big Power:One of the slimmest and lightest 10,000mAh portable chargers on the market. Provides 2.25 charges for iPhone 12, 1.6 charges for Galaxy S20 and 1.2 charges for iPad mini 5.The two input ports may not be used at the same time. The USB-C input port has no output function.

Versatile Charging: Anker's exclusive PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technology combine to detect and deliver a tailored charge up to 12W, while the trickle-charging mode is the best way to charge low-power devices.
Superior Safety:Anker’s comprehensive MultiProtect safety system includes overcharge protection, short circuit protection, temperature control, and more.

What You Get: PowerCore Slim 10000 portable charger, Micro USB cable (to charge the power bank, USB-C cable and Lightning cable not included), welcome guide, 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anker 313 Power Bank (PowerCore 10K) The Slim and Compact 10000mAh Portable Charger From Anker, America's Leading Charging Brand - Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology - 55 million+ happy users and counting Astonishing Size Anker 313 Power Bank is incredibly slim and light for its large cell capacity. It can charge a phone up to three times and most tablets once. Weighing just half a pound, it’s only slightly heavier than a baseball and is designed to fit comfortably in your palm or pocket; perfect for work or traveling. Advanced Charging Technology Anker's exclusive PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies combine to ensure the fastest possible charge up to 2.4 A. Does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge. Trickle-Charging Mode Trickle charging is designed to provide optimized charging to low-power devices such as earphones, Bluetooth speakers, and other accessories. To activate, press the power button twice or press and hold for 2 seconds until the LED indicator turns green.

Recharge Your Way Use Micro USB or USB-C (input only) to recharge in just 5.5 hours. Micro USB cable included. USB-C and Lightning cables not included. Notes: - USB-C cable, Lightning cable, and AC adapter not included. - When the trickle-charging mode is on, the last LED light will remain green, regardless of battery status. - The two input ports may not be used at the same time. The USB-C input port has no output function. - Compatible with 12'' 2015 MacBook (USB-C cable required), iPhone XS / XS Max / XR, Android smartphones and tablets (including the Nexus 7), and other USB-charged devices. - Recharging will take 5.5 hours with a 10W charger (not included) and the USB-C port cannot charge devices. - ​​10,000mAh is the total nominal rated capacity of the internal battery cells. Dimensions: 5.87 x 2.68 x 0.55 inches; Weight: 7.5 ounces - The power bank is flight-approved and allowed on a plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puts charge into my S8 quickly
reviews.reviewText: I bought this a few months ago as 'emergency backup', if I happened to be away from a charging source (so, not in a building or car; generally for camping and the like). The battery in my Galaxy S8 has degraded over time, and I wasn't ready to get spendy on a new phone, nor did I look forward to 'cell phone surgery' to replace the battery (the days of popping off the case back and swapping out in a minute or two are long gone, sad to say). So I ordered this up. At 10,000 mAh, I figured I should get enough charge to get me through a jam.If you're thinking... "S8! That's a dinosaur!" -- you're likely rocking something much more current, and aren't worried about off-grid power. Yet. But remember -- all batteries degrade with time.After having used it... my thoughts- Takes a bit to charge up, once discharged (so once you've discharged, plan ahead). Especially the first time.- However, once it's charged up, the self-discharge rate is slow, so you don't have to constantly keep it plugged into a wall wart, etc. You can charge this up, once conditioned, and pack it away for a few weeks to a few months.- The 4 LED meters on the front are handy for determining SoC / Time to Charge- Form factor on this is very similar to the dimensions on my S8 (although a little thicker, and of course, heavier)- A shorter USB A <> USB-C cable does double duty -- USB A to bring the charge to the phone / device via USB-C, then remove & flip USB-C into the input of the Anker, while plugging the 'A' end into any compatible port to recharge it.- Comes with a black cloth bag with drawstring closure, which is nice to keep that short USB cable together with the device. Nothing fancy, but useful.- And probably the best, after using Qi-Wireless for 90% of the time over the life of the G8 -- this thing puts juice into the phone, quickly. I can go from 5-15% charge to 30% in under 30min. Not sure how many amps it's charging at (rated at 'up to 12' -?), but it's definitely quick. If you're caught somewhere without power (or even if you're not) -- this device is a lifesaver (figuratively & perhaps literally, I guess).Technically, I guess you're not supposed to use the phone while charging with a power bank, but it comes in handy for those times where you need to use the phone a little longer, but need a little juice to tide you over (it juices the phone so fast--especially vs. Qi-wireless--that you say "I might as well just keep it hooked up to this)). I think it'll charge close to 100% in about 90 minutes, maybe less.- Since my G8 battery is ~ 3800 mAh (?), I can get up to two full charges out of this thing, or many 'partial' charges. From full, 30 minutes' time on the G8 doesn't even remove one 'dot' from the 4-light meter. This is real value, in my book. Because most of the time, I can get back to a power source in 30min or so.So... for what I'm using it for, which is to buy time until I decide to finally (!) upgrade my phone, and keep the S8 running a little while longer... it's an excellent accessory, from a trusted company. Since this has been out a while, and been superseded by higher-cap devices, solar-capable chargers, etc. -- it's also cheap -- about the cost of one of those replacement battery kits (with batteries that came from who knows where).Not often I unequivocally give the full 5-stars... but this product gets them from me. Recommended.(oh, and mine came new in a box, so if yours doesn't... get in touch with Anker for a new replacement)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power Packed & Portable! A Must-Have Charger! ⚡
reviews.reviewText: I recently got my hands on the Anker PowerCore Slim 10000, and it's nothing short of a game-changer! This portable charger lives up to its promises, and then some. The sleek design and premium build quality make it a joy to carry, fitting effortlessly into my pocket without compromising on power.The slim size doesn't compromise on capacity – with 10,000mAh, it's a powerhouse! I tested it with my iPhone 13, and it delivered a speedy and efficient charge, thanks to Anker's PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technology. What impressed me the most was the attention to safety. Anker's MultiProtect system ensured my device was shielded from overcharging, short circuits, and temperature spikes, providing peace of mind during every recharge.The versatility of this charger is another standout feature. The trickle-charging mode is a game-changer for low-power devices, ensuring they get the optimal charge. The inclusion of two input ports is handy, although it's essential to note that they can't be used simultaneously – a minor trade-off for the overall convenience and reliability this charger offers. Kudos to Anker for including a Micro USB cable, making it ready to go right out of the box.In conclusion, the Anker PowerCore Slim 10000 is a must-have for anyone on the move. It's the perfect blend of style, portability, and power, making it an essential companion for my tech-filled adventures. I wholeheartedly give it a solid 5 out of 5 stars! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleashing Superpowers: the Lifesaver You Need!
reviews.reviewText: Have you ever experienced the panic of seeing your phone battery drain to 1% while you're in the middle of a road trip or a day-long adventure? I certainly have! But fear no more, my fellow adventurers, for I have discovered the ultimate solution: the Anker Portable Charger, 313 Power Bank (PowerCore Slim 10K)!Let me share my personal experience and why this remarkable power bank has earned its spot as my trusty sidekick. As a tech enthusiast who loves exploring the great outdoors, I depend heavily on my smartphone for navigation, capturing memories, and staying connected. But as we all know, battery life can be a real buzzkill. That's where the Anker Portable Charger comes to the rescue!First and foremost, this power bank boasts a whopping 10,000mAh battery capacity, providing me with enough juice to revive my phone multiple times. It's like having a superhero's power at my fingertips! With this portable charger in my backpack, I can bid farewell to the anxiety of running out of battery power at the most inconvenient moments.What sets the Anker PowerCore Slim 10K apart from the rest is its sleek design. It's incredibly slim, compact, and lightweight, making it the perfect travel companion. Gone are the days of bulky power banks weighing down my pockets or bags. The Anker PowerCore Slim 10K slides effortlessly into any pocket, leaving me feeling light and free.Now, let's talk about charging speed. The PowerIQ Charging Technology integrated into this power bank is a game-changer. It automatically detects the device connected and delivers the fastest possible charge, ensuring that I spend less time waiting and more time enjoying my adventures. Whether I'm charging my iPhone or my Samsung Galaxy, the Anker Portable Charger handles it all with lightning speed.I must highlight the USB-C input, which provides an incredibly convenient way to recharge the power bank itself. Just a single cable and my power bank is ready to go again. No more fumbling with multiple cables or searching for an elusive wall outlet. This feature alone has saved me from countless moments of despair when I've forgotten to charge my power bank overnight.One of the key aspects I appreciate about Anker is their commitment to safety. The PowerCore Slim 10K comes with multiple safety features, including surge protection, short circuit prevention, and overcharge protection. This gives me peace of mind knowing that my precious devices are safeguarded against any potential mishaps.But let's get to the fun part—the funny moments that this power bank has helped me navigate. Picture this: I'm in the middle of a breathtaking hike, capturing stunning photos of nature's beauty when suddenly, my phone dies. Panic sets in, but then I remember my trusty Anker PowerCore Slim 10K. With a quick connection, my phone starts charging, and I'm back in action, saving the day (and the photos)!Or how about the time I was stuck at an airport during a long layover? I found myself a cozy corner, plugged in my phone to the Anker Portable Charger, and binge-watched my favorite TV series without worrying about draining my battery. The power bank kept me entertained and kept my phone alive throughout the entire layover. It was like having my own personal entertainment station in my backpack.In conclusion, the Anker Portable Charger, 313 Power Bank (PowerCore Slim 10K), is an absolute game-changer. With its massive battery capacity, sleek design, fast charging capabilities, and emphasis on safety, it has become an indispensable companion for all my adventures. From surviving unexpected power outages to ensuring I capture every precious moment, this power bank has proven itself time and time again.So, if you're tired of being at the mercy of low battery warnings and are ready to unleash your inner superhero, I highly recommend the Anker Portable Charger, 313 Power Bank (PowerCore Slim 10K). Say goodbye to battery anxiety and hello to worry-free exploration! Get yours today and experience the magic for yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: It works as intended, though doesn't charge my phone fast or charge up crazy fast that's the only downside it is slim though and still a portable charger!

reviews.reviewTitle: this has improved my life alot
reviews.reviewText: I use this to travel around the city its so handy. I got a job recently and had to travel around the city during the interview process. I could not have got the job without this battery pack. It always works and holds a huge charge. please just buy it because you will need it at some point this year and it will improve your life having it at the ready

I bought this portable charger for my travels.It’s slim and compact. Looks good. Quality does not feel cheap. Charges my iPhone fairly quick.Good to have while your travelling. I like it.Downside: It has two input ports for charging the actual device itself and only ONE output for charging your personal device like your iPhone/tablet/earphones etc. I personally would rather have one USB port to charge the portable charger itself and then have two output ports for charging multiple devices (ex: your iPhone and Apple Watch at the same time). But that’s my opinion and user feedback. Wireless charging would also be a cool feature to have too. Overall it’s a good compacted portable charger that gets the job done. I also don’t feel like the batter is significantly drained after charging my device(s). I used the portable charger this afternoon to briefly charge my iPhone. I’m currently charging my Apple Watch from approx. 11% to 100% and then about to charge my iPhone again (<20%) and the portable charger looks like it still has a full-charge.
batterie très utile au quotidien !recharge complétement 2 fois un One plus 8 pro (4900mAh)très légère, compact, elle saura se faire oublier dans une poche ou un sac.
buena calidad de construccion y carga muy rapida al telefono. Tengo que probarlo a ver si carga un pc o tablet . Pero contento, buena compra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Anker Power Bank 10000mAh has proven to be a reliable companion for my daily charging needs. Its slim and lightweight design makes it incredibly portable, effortlessly slipping into my pocket or bag without adding unnecessary bulk. The sleek aesthetic is a bonus, giving it a modern and premium feel.The 10,000mAh battery size ensures that I have ample power to keep my devices charged throughout the day, and at this price point, it's excellent value for money. The convenience factor cannot be overstated, making it a go-to solution for those who are always on the move.While it doesn't support fast charging, the PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies deliver a reasonably swift and efficient charge. It's a small trade-off for the affordability and portability it offers. The absence of multiple outputs and additional features like a flashlight may be a drawback for some, but for me, the core functionality is what matters most.Despite its limitations, the Anker Power Bank 10000mAh stands out for its reliability, solid build, and overall performance. It may lack some bells and whistles, but for those seeking a straightforward, dependable power solution, this Anker model is a commendable choice. It has certainly earned its place in my tech arsenal, providing a convenient and efficient charging solution on the go.If you have a slightly bigger budget id recommend the 20kmAh Anker portable charger as it can charge multiple devices at has fast charge capabilities. Working in tech it does hold more benefits for myself, however for the average joe I highly recommend this product.
